panels.description: Buttery shortbread, creamy chocolate and gooey caramel sandwhiched between. What's not to love!

panels.alt: Kale and Quinoa Salad with Lemon Miso Dressing.
panels.description: This Kale and Quinoa Salad with Lemon Miso Dressing satisfies the craving for something light and refreshing, making it perfect to enjoy on a hot summer day.
Lemon Blueberry Granola. This granola is easy to make, healthy, and amazing. Perfect with milk for breakfast or to serve on yogurt!
Chicken stuffed with ham, swiss cheese, and bacon, then rolled in a deliciously spiced panko mixture.
